name: Explore Thing Lost 2
description:
Explore Thing Lost 2 is a seek and find hidden object adventure game for escape game lovers, welcome to the mystery mansion. Can you clean the messy living rooms and mansion interiors?Solve the hidden object mystery in the messy room and prove your problem solving skills with find objects in a picture puzzles. Download our new series of hidden object games free and become a real hidden objects detective! Find all the things and artifacts hidden in a picture of messy mansion and share this hidden object adventure with your friends and family members.

This game also comes bundled with 26 find the difference puzzles totally free. In spot the difference games your goal is to find difference between 2 pictures of house interiors and modern rooms.
